author: Adriana Diaz
title: Latino communities struggle during coronavirus pandemic
description: "We don't have the benefit of 'I should just stay home,'" a first-generation Mexican American tells CBS News of the need to make money during the pandemic.
content: Chicago — Like African Americans, the nation's Latinos are disproportionately impacted by the coronavirus. According to the Centers for Disease Control, Latinos represent more than 27% of COVID-19 deaths in areas considered virus hotspots, although they accou… [+3737 chars]
